hanzi-su-wiki:
巣

Значения

Гнездо, логово, улей

Мнемоника

Гнездо на вершине дерева 木. Точки — головы трёх птенчиков.

Варианты

巢
purpleculture_pinyin:
cháo
Japanese variant of 巢
Японский вариант 巢
rtega_mnemonic:
巢巢RS
巣巣		nest, living quarter in tree
  • birds nest (body 田 of flowing 巛 feathers) on top of a tree 木 → 巢 → 巣
heisig_constituent: nest, owl, fruit, rice field, brains, tree, wood
koohiiStory1: The nest atop of a tree contains the fruit of the owl: its offspring.
koohiiStory2: The wise old OWL makes her nest out of FRUIT, carving out the middle for her chicks, because then it´s less work: no running back & forth to get food!
jp_example_words: 巣(す): nest, rookery, breeding place, beehive, cobweb, den
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Birds use grass and fruit to make their nests.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture a cute little nest with a family of birds in it. It looks like it was woven together with bits of grass and strawberries, so it smells delicious too.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The bottom of the nest also seems to be padded with someone's suit (す). Did... did this bird attack a human for this?!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture the nest, made of grass, fruit, and the suit of the angry salaryman who's shouting below the tree, and missing the top half of his suit.
Ru_Russian: гнездо, птичий базар, улей, паутина, логово
Ru_Notes: Сравни: 栖 (すむ、セイ обитель, логово).
Ru_Words:
巣す
  • гнездо, лежбище, улей, муравейник, паутина, берлога
  • логово, обиталище, притон
    • 巣くうすくう
  • вить гнездо, гнездиться
    • warodai
    巣立つすだつ
  • покидать гнездо, обр. покидать родной дом, окончить школу
    • warodai
    卵巣らんそう
  • яичник
    • EDICT2
    営巣えいそう
  • устроение гнезда
    • 巣箱すばこ
  • ящик с гнёздами для кур (сооружение в птичнике), скворешня
    • warodai
    巣窟そうくつ
  • гнездо, логовище, притон
    • warodai
    帰巣きすう
  • инстинкт возвращения в гнездо
    • 蜘蛛の巣くものす
  • паутина
    • JR-EDICT
    空巣あきす
  • похищение вещей из квартиры (когда никого нет дома)
  • квартирный вор, домушник
    • warodai
    蜂巣胃ほうそうい
  • медовые соты
    • warodai
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the small (⺍) result (果) is a nest

巣字的基本解释

巣
cháo
古同“巢”。

巣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cháo］
同“巢1”。
《宋元以来俗字谱》，“巢”，《列女传》作“巣”。按，亦为“巢”的日本用简体汉字。

暂无。

[①]［cháo］
Same as "Nest 1".
"Song and Yuan Dynasties", "Nest", "Biography of Women" as "巣". Press, Japanese simplified Chinese characters, also known as "Nest".

巣
Name meaning

cháo
яп. вм. 巢
Radicals: 果  (fruit, grass)
Meaning Mnemonic
Birds use grass and fruit to make their nests.
Picture a cute little nest with a family of birds in it. It looks like it was woven together with bits of grass and strawberries, so it smells delicious too.
Reading Mnemonic
The bottom of the nest also seems to be padded with someone's suit (す). Did... did this bird attack a human for this?!
Picture the nest, made of grass, fruit, and the suit of the angry salaryman who's shouting below the tree, and missing the top half of his suit.
